title: A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge
sourceDesc: Berkeley’s [Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge] was first published in 1710, and then again in 1734 together with the [Three Dialogues Between Hylas and Philonous]. Our copytext is this later edition, which corrects a few typographical errors, makes some small stylistic improvements, and uses more modern spelling. The original dedication and preface from the 1710 edition, not reprinted in 1734, are also included. The text here derives from David Wilkins’s online edition.
